project_descr: The Joint Programme was designed in line with the Government priorities to address the Aral Sea crisis. The overall goal of the Programme is to improve the economic, food, health and environmental security of poor rural communities of Karakalpakstan.

outputs.output_descr: Enhancing capacities of regional and district authorities in development and implementation of policies aimed at welfare improvement of vulnerable groups affected by Aral Sea disaster
donor_name: UN Tr Fund for Human Security

outputs.output_descr: Income generation opportunities aimed at welfare improvement of vulnerable groups affected by Aral Sea disaster
donor_name: UN Tr Fund for Human Security
